summary: Implements a video effect that extracts a rectangular subregion from an input clip, returning a new clip limited to that area. The region can be specified using absolute corner coordinates, width and height, or a center point with dimensions, accepting pixel values as integers or floats.
business_intent: Allows video editing workflows and automated processing pipelines to focus on or isolate specific portions of footage by cropping out unwanted borders, centering on subjects, or preparing clips for downstream analysis.
